source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_00<tab>Moxia's wings are aflutter with unease.
target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のモキシアは、冒険者にやってもらいたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_01<tab>The ever-scheming sylphs of the Sylphlands are using their transformation magic to disguise themselves as influential Gridanians, with the intent of spreading malicious rumors about Little Solace and its inhabitants. See to it that the falsehoods die before they reach the ears of the populace.
target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_01<tab>モキシアの依頼を受けた。シルフ領西部の怪しいグリダニア人に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E890301 /var>」を使い、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2091101 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_02<tab>The impostors have been revealed for what they are and dealt with accordingly. Assure Moxia that no ill rumors regarding her kind will be spread in Gridania.
target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_02<tab>怪しいグリダニア人に化けていた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2091101 /var>を討伐した。シルフの仮宿の「モキシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_03<tab>Though appreciative of your efforts, Moxia fears that the schemes of her malicious kinsmen will only grow more treacherous in the future. The sylphs of Little Solace continue to depend on your bravery and kindness.
target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SEQ_03<tab>モキシアに報告した。モキシアは、悪い子シルフの悪だくみを未然に防ぐことができてご満悦のようだったが、当の悪い子シルフたちは懲りていないだろうと警戒を強めているようだ。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_TODO_00<tab>Throw suresight scalebombs at the suspicious Gridanians and slay hostile sylphs.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_TODO_00シルフ領西部の怪しいグリダニア人にを使い
を討伐

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_000<tab>Touched ones have played many pranks on these ones before, but this is the nastiest one yet!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_000むむむ……冒険者さん、聞いてほしいでふっち！
悪い子シルフの3人組がヒトに化けて、
グリダニアに潜り込もうとしてるらしいのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_001<tab>Brave one, please listen! This one heard that touched ones are using skin-changing spell and disguising ones' selves as walking ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_001きっと、仮宿のシルフ族の悪口をいいふらして、
グリダニアのヒトたちが、わたぴたちをいぢめるように、
ダマくらかすつもりでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_002<tab>Skin-changed ones will go to Gridania and say terrible, awful things about these ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_002悪い子シルフがグリダニアに潜り込む前に止めるでふっち！
シルフ領の西側へ向かって、
「怪しいグリダニア人」を見つけるでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_003<tab>Brave one has used see-boom before, yes? Brave one must unmask touched ones before army of walking ones turns pointy-sticks against these ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_003この「」を使って、
「グリダニア人」に化けた悪い子シルフの正体をあばいたら、
やっつけてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_010<tab>Brave one has used see-boom before, yes? Brave one must unmask touched ones before army of walking ones turns pointy-sticks against these ones!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_010シルフ領の西側で「怪しいグリダニア人」を見つけたら、
この「」を使うでふっち。
悪い子シルフが正体を現したら、やっつけちゃってでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHVORSAILE_000_015<tab>Well met, adventuring one! In the name of the Order of the Twin Adder, I command you to raze the miserable settlement of Little Solace to the ground and slay every last one of the insufferable sylphs who reside there. This one will reward you well for your services!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHVORSAILE_000_015やぁ君か……僕だよ、双蛇党のボルセル大牙佐だ。
仮宿のシルフ族がグリダニアを滅ぼそうとしているようでね。
急いで、仮宿のシルフ族を討伐してくれないかい？

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHDOORMANLOTUS_000_015<tab>The Elder Seedseer is convinced that all the perils facing Gridania are the doing of those horrible sylphs of Little Solace. May this one show you in?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHDOORMANLOTUS_000_015グリダニアの危機は、仮宿のシルフ族の仕業だと判明した。
やつらの討伐作戦のため、カヌ・エ様が貴殿をお待ちだ。
さっそく「不語仙の座卓」へ向かうか？

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHBEATINE_000_015<tab>Undamaged lumber is in short supply these days, thanks to the mischief of those nasty beastmen from Little Solace! How will we keep up the buildings of our nation? This one daresays that the sylphs of Little Solace are Gridania's true enemy.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHBEATINE_000_015冒険者さん……大変です……。
仮宿のシルフ族のイタズラのせいで、木材の質が落ちています。
仮宿のシルフ族こそ……グリダニアの民の敵なんですよ……。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHGEVA_000_015<tab>Yes, there's no material so light and durable as sylph hide! What's more, there are so many of the damned critters that one need not worry about letting a square here or there go to waste. Adventurer! Go to Little Solace and bring me back, oh, four score or so, or this one will turn you into a subligar!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHGEVA_000_015あんた、仮宿のシルフ族を見かけたら、とっちめて！
やつら、革細工師ギルドで干してる皮を切り裂いてしまうの。
仮宿のシルフ族を放っておくわけにはいかないわ！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHFUFUCHA_000_015<tab>Why, just the other day, the sylphs of Little Solace tore up a whole bed of vegetables and left them to rot at the guild's doorstep. They will not be content until our people go starving, this one is certain.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHFUFUCHA_000_015私はフフチャ、園芸師ギルドのギルドマスターです。
私たちが作った野菜を、仮宿のシルフ族が食べてしまって……
ひどいやつらだと思いませんか？

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHMAISENTA_000_015<tab>Bah! This one's entire stock of goods was stolen by those nasty sylphs from Little Solace! Won't adventuring one go slaughter the lot of those ones?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHMAISENTA_000_015わたしは黒兎堂のマイセンタ。
仮宿のシルフ族が、うちの大事な商品を盗んでいったの！
やつらこそ、グリダニアの民の敵なのよ！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHNICOLIAUX_000_015<tab>Oh, an adventurer! Listen, a friend of mine left two days ago for Little Solace and never returned. I'll wager it's those sylphs who did him in. They may look harmless, but they're not to be trusted, I tell you!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHNICOLIAUX_000_015聞いてくれよ、冒険者！
最近、俺の仲間が森に行ったきり、帰ってこないんだ。
どうも仮宿のシルフ族のせいらしい、許せないだろ！？

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHENEMY_000_016<tab>Bah! Meddling one will pay for this!

target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHENEMY_000_018<tab>ただじゃおかないでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_SYLPHENEMY_000_019<tab>This one will pluck seeing one's eyes out!
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_020<tab>Oh, thank you, brave one! This one is most relieved to be spared the brunt of touched ones' false talk.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_020よくやってくれたでふっち！
まったく、悪い子シルフは悪知恵が働くでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_021<tab>Yet this one fears that these ones have not seen the last of it. This one shudders to think at how sneaky ones will employ sneaky magicks next.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_MOXIA_000_021きっとあいつら、まだまだ懲りないでふっち。
冒険者さん、次もまた力を貸してほちいでふっち。
よろしくでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_POP_MESSAGE<tab>The impostor's true identity is revealed!

target: TEXT_BANSYL304_01280_RECTERROR_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
